entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 06:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: S 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind light except north 40 km/h near Bowen Island this morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
